message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.CV, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with sampling, approximation, and filtering of functions on graphs, which are common topics in information theory (cs.IT), data structures (cs.DS), computer graphics (cs.CG), computer vision (cs.CV), and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of Laplace operators and Poincare and Plancherel-Polya-type inequalities also suggests a connection to harmonic analysis, which is often studied in the context of information theory and machine learning.
